add_subdirectory(batchsystem/)
add_subdirectory(xcat/)

set(CLIPP_INCLUDE_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/clipp/include/" CACHE INTERNAL "")
set(RAPIDJSON_INCLUDE_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/clipp/include/" CACHE INTERNAL "")
set(INVOKE_LITE_INCLUDE_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/invoke-lite/include/" CACHE INTERNAL "")
